title: hE murugA
sahitya:
hE murugA Ezhai endanai nI marandadum EnayyA


anupallavi

  pAmaran aDiyEn paDum pADuDanE parandODa nI manam uvandaruLat-tAmadippadum EnaiyyA


caraNam    maruburakkarai kANA karum tiraikkaDal ena varaiyilAk-karuNaiyin uruvamAna perumAnE
porumaiyODu iduvarai porutta en varuttam pOkka un kaDaikkaN nOkkenru kiDaikkumO
